unnormalised: ### Tumchea Fuddlea Shivonn Kamak Chook Nasloli Mop Ghevpacho Ut'tom Margdorxok!
normalised: ### Tumchea Fuddlea Xivnn Kamak Puroponnan Mapam Gheuncheak Nihal Margdarshak!

unnormalised: Borem, tumi pod'dheasthit korpachea adbhut sonvsarant bud'di marunk nirdhar kel'lo asa! Xabas! Punn tumi tenka sundor kopddeak sparx korpacho *vichar* korchea poilim, chook nasloli mop ghevpache kolecher probhutv mellounk zai. Mhojecher visvas dovrat, hi step soddun dilear komkoch utponnak sthapit korche bhaxen asa - tem porjun vochchem, vo komkoch dischem!
normalised: Okay, tumi xivnnachea adbhut sonvsarant buddo divpak nirnnoy ghetla! Bhov borem! Punn tumi tea sobit kapddeak hat lavchea adim-i, tumkam puroponnan mapam gheuche kalleche dnyan asunk zai. Mhojeacher visvas dovrat, hi step soddun divop mhollear dolmalleacho buniyadicher ghor bandpachem bhaxen asa - tem kosollttlem, vo kam-i aslem tor tem odd dhista!

unnormalised: Poili vost man, tumchea lagim visvasacho meji tape aslolo zai. Sentimeter (cm) ani inch (in) donuy aslolo tor ut'tom, khas korun tumi sonvsarantlea vegvegllea bhagamvellantlea ddxanvancher kam kortat zalear. Tumcho meji tape lamb zalolo vo nuksan zal'lelo naxil'lo asunk di, vo tumik khub pois axil'lim map mellttolim. Oxem chintun pollyat: tapeak 102 cm dakhoita punn to 100 cm asonk zai astana khub fittinganche prasn utponn kortolo!
normalised: Poileach vostuk poilem, tumkam visvasachi measuring tape zai. Sentimitor (c-m) ani inch (i-n) donui asleli zat ut'tom, khas korun tumi sonvsarantlea vegvegllea bhagam than yevpi patternsacher kam kortat zalear. Tumchi measuring tape tanlli na vo vignant zalea, na tor tumkam mapam mellttalim tim khub duren astali. Hem oxem vichar: ek tape jem ekxim don c-m dakhoita jenna tem ekxim c-m asunk zai aslolo zaite fitting problemsak karan zata!

unnormalised: Atam, mulabhut vostunche khatir. Tuka modot korunk ek ixtt dhorat - tumchea soben yer ukaddun ghevn khub kotthin asa! Bust thavn survat korat. Tumchea hatanchem purnn bhagacher map gheat, tape bhuyek samantar dovrun. Tem number khala ddyat! Uprant vost waist. Tumchi soben vost waistline mellvon gheat (sadharonnponni tumchea angachem tonnki bhag) ani tache bhonvtonni mop gheat. Dhakllun dhyan naka! Tumik vastu map zai. Hips uprant asat. Tumchea hipsanchem purnn bhagacher map gheat, punn tape bhuyek samantar dovrun. Ek saree blouse khatir, tumik shoulder width legit zai, eka shoulderchea konnea thavn dusrea shoulderchea konneak, tumchea sobentlean mapun ghetat. Tt sadharonnponni 14-16 inch aschem. Armhole depth legit ddyat, sadharonnponni 6-7 inch.
normalised: Atam, basicam khatir. Tumchi modot korpak ek ixtt sodat – tumchea apnnankuch puroponnan fattiche mapam gheunchen lagbhog asakhy asa! Bust than suru korat. Tumchea chestchea soglleant bharaichea bhagache votallem mapat gheat, tape zomnicher parallel dovrun. To ankddo dhillear boro! Uprant waist yeta. Tumchi natural waistline (samany ritin tumchea torsocho sankddo bhag) sado ani tache votallem mapat gheat. Bhitor soshunakai! Tumkam ek vostavik map zai. Hips uprant yetat. Tumchea hipschea soglleant bharaichea bhagache votallem mapat gheat, punn tape zomnicher parallel dovrun. Ek saree blouse khatir, tumkam shoulder width-ui zai, tumchea eka shoulderchea konnachea dusrea shoulderchea konnak, tumchea fatticherun mapun. Tem samany ritin chodda-chodd dha te sola inch asta. Armhole depth-ui gheat, jenna ti sadharanponni so te sat inch asta.

unnormalised: Detail visrunakat! Sleeve length khatir, shoulder point thavn tumka sleeve sonpacho asa tea bhagak map gheat. Pantsak, tumik inseam zai (crotch thavn ankle) ani outseam (waist thavn ankle). Tumi ek kurta kortat zalear, tumik kurta length zai, shoulder thavn sarpnnar hemline, sadharonnponni 40-45 inch.
normalised: Details visor naka! Sleeve length khatir, shoulderchea point than khala mapat gheat zaka tumi sleeve sampunk zai asat. Pants khatir, tumkam inseam (crotch than ankle meren) ani outseam (waist than ankle meren) zai astali. Tumi ek kurta kortat zalear, tumkam kurta length zai astali, shoulder than khala mapun zaka tumi hemline asunk zai, samany ritin challis te challis panch inch.

unnormalised: Pro Tip: Map ghevnachem tumka thoddi ease vadhavat. Ease kiteak, tum prasn kortat? Tea vadhavnnichea vargonnichea karonnak tumik, tuka khobor asa, khoreponnim tumchea kopddeamnim *halunk* melltta! Ek fitted garment khatir, tumchea bust, waist ani hipsanchea mapanim sumarponnim 1-2 cm (0.5-1 in) vadhavat. Thodde jast susegad khatir, anik legit vadhavat! Zero ease aslolo saree blouse soddunk yatn korcho chintun pollait - boreponnim nashil'lem!
normalised: Pro Tip: Jenna mapam ghetat, tedna thoddem vaddicheak ease khatir misollat. Ease kitem, tumi vicharta? Ti zaga tumkam halpak dolpak melltta, tumkam khobor asa, tumchea kapddeamni! Ek fitted garment khatir, ek te don c-m (zero point panch te ek i-n) tumchea bust, waist, ani hip measurementsak misollat. Kitem-i dhill korpak, ani-i chodd misollat! Zero ease aslelea saree blouse-ant bosuncheak tumi prayatn kortat tem kalpna korat – boreponn na!

unnormalised: Dusri vashishttachi vost mhonnje units! Tumchea mejpannichea units kodden sthir rakhun pollyat. Tumchea bust khatir cm ani tumchea waist khatir inch mix korunk naka! Hi ek khub khub komkoch dispi garmentak vorunk xakta!
normalised: Dusrem yaad dovortoleacho mukhelponn mhollear units! Dhayan divnchea unitsacher tumi nirntar asat mhunn zanno zayat. Tumchea bust khatir c-m ani tumchea waist khatir inches misollanaka! Hem ek khup khup odd distolea garmentak vhorun veta!

unnormalised: Nimannem, ani hem khub motvachem asa, sogllem spoxttoponnann khala ddyat! Mhojem bhonvtonnichem mapak khatir ek chart ddyavnk ruchta. Bust: ___, Waist: ___, Hips: ___, ani oxem. Hea margan, tum vellar gunttlem zanvchenm nhoi. Chook nasloli mop ghevn khub dukhm asunk xakta, punn ti tumka ut'tom basal'lea kopddeamnim nirman korpachee chavi. Tori, tumcho vell kaddat, thoddi motim ghodvat, ani sukhichea shivonnakat! Tumchea purnn fittink even 0.5 cm sonvsarachea porak ddyavnk xakta yad dovrat!
normalised: Shevottak, ani hem khup mhotvachem asa, soglleank saf saf boro! Mhaka dor ek measurementachea labelsantlelim ek chottti vostu toyar korunk khub dista. Bust: ___, Waist: ___, Hips: ___, ani oxem chalu dovrat. Hya ritin, tumi uprant bholannar poddchenam. Puroponnan mapam gheunchen tumkam ek vedna dista, punn kapdde toyar korpachi mukhel chavi asa jinnim tumkam puroponnan fit dista. Tor, tumcho vell gheat, puroponnan ravat, ani tumkam bore xivnnachi subhechha! Yaad dovrat ki zero point panch c-m-i tumchea overall fitacher ek sonvsarachem antar korunk shaktta!
